DOC.criteria: Patients with Ulcerative Colitis (UC) at active phase who are defined to show Ulcerative ColitisDisease Activitiy Index (UCDAI) score of 3 or higher but 8 or less, and bloody stool score of 1 or higher Patients with serious or higher according to diagnostic critera of seriousness and patients with chronic persistent type and with acute serious type in the classification by clinical course
